= The route to Alcon =
1. Battle at the Gate – First battles with hobgoblins. 11. [[EncounterAtDwarfRoadGate>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/EncounterAtDwarfRoadGate||class="twikiLink"]] – The party surprises a group of hobgoblins sent by Akath-Magog to scout the land. 956XP encounter. It is late afternoon when the party exits the gate, the hobgoblins are sleeping. 11. [[InPursuitOfABugbear>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/InPursuitOfABugbear||class="twikiLink"]] – A bugbear spies the party and must be tracked down. 11. [[LairOfTheFoxWoman>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/LairOfTheFoxWoman||class="twikiLink"]] – While attempting to track the bugbear the party stumbles upon a woman in a cottage. 1. [[WildWood>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/WildWood||class="twikiLink"]] Manor - The Prodigal Jack is met and the party finds a base of operations. 11. [[JackKillsABugbear>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/JackKillsABugbear||class="twikiLink"]] - Prodigal Jack meets the party and demonstrates his abilities. 11. [[The Manor>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/WildWood||class="twikiLink"]], a base of operations - Jack takes the party back to his base. 11. [[TheHobgoblinsStrikeBack>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/TheHobgoblinsStrikeBack||class="twikiLink"]] - The hobgoblins attack the manor and the party defends (or not). 1. Finding the path and learning of the coming of Akath-Magog. 11. (% class="twikiNewLink" %)BugbearAmbush[[?>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/edit/DungeonMaster/BugbearAmbush?topicparent=DungeonMaster.RouteToAlconStoryArc||rel="nofollow" title="Create this topic"]](%%) - bugbear skirmishers waylay the party. 11. (% class="twikiNewLink" %)EncounterWithGoblinWolfRiders[[?>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/edit/DungeonMaster/EncounterWithGoblinWolfRiders?topicparent=DungeonMaster.RouteToAlconStoryArc||rel="nofollow" title="Create this topic"]](%%) - The party encounters more monsters as it follows the path to Alcon. 11. [[LieutenantSodrassAndHisMinions>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/LieutenantSodrassAndHisMinions||class="twikiLink"]] - The party meets an old enemy and may learn new information.

1. Finding the shaft 11. Battle at the shaft - flying baddies (drakes?) 11. Climbing the shaft – skill challenge? 11. Ghost of an Ancient Dwarf - Given Directions to go down the shaft to the seal (some protection item?) 1. Buglady's brother - A demonic being plus dwarven wraiths 1. The great seal - Dudley's fate revealed 11. The ruined stair - Monsters and terrain hazards 11. At the Seal - Dudley and his party are found 11. Confronting the evil (some sort of challenge)
